name: Battle Of The Bit Dungeon
description:
INFO

This game was made within 16 hours as a thank you to my 1000 followers over at youtube. 

The premise of  "Battle Of The Bit Dungeon" is pretty simple to understand but it takes time to perform correctly. You, the player, need to defeat enemies by solving their math problems. The only issue is that you can only solve the sum (4 + 8)  by giving the answer back in binary (1100 (->12)).

CONTROLS

WASD - Used to move the player
Left Mouse Button - Used to select the bits during an encounter

!Please note: that you'll be counting up from right to left, this means that the layout looks like this -> 0 0 0 0 = 8 4 2 1!

I wish you the best of luck and thanks for your time
